cars.description: This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan Rogue with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
This car has. acheck engine light on because of an 02 sensor, and the paint colors look like they don't quite match in some places!
This car has been completely destroyed by little children and pets. comes with free old french fries
There is literally no suspension on this car, and driving over tiny pebles feels like you're launching over a speedbump
